author: newsr.in
title: iOS 9 will be available on September 16 for 4s and newer, iPad 2 and newer, iPad mini and newer
text: iOS 9, Apple’s latest and greatest mobile operating system update, will be available on September 16 for existing iPhone and iPad owners. That’s just a week away! Like its predecessors, iOS 9 will not be available on older iOS devices. That said, it has the same requirements as iOS 8: owners of an iPhone 4s […] »
